title: Why Verstappen’s win was on merit
description: A Red Bull victory, an unhappy Mercedes Podium and Ferrari dramas. The ESPN F1 crew look at the good, the bad and the ugly from the 70th Anniversary Grand Prix at Silverstone.
itunes:title: Why Verstappen’s win was on merit
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Ferrari dramas, a Red Bull victory, and an unhappy Mercedes podium. A look at the dramatic 70th Anniversary Grand Prix at Silverstone.
itunes:summary: A Red Bull victory, an unhappy Mercedes Podium and Ferrari dramas. The ESPN F1 crew look at the good, the bad and the ugly from the 70th Anniversary Grand Prix at Silverstone.
content:encoded: A Red Bull victory, an unhappy Mercedes Podium and Ferrari dramas. The ESPN F1 crew look at the good, the bad and the ugly from the 70th Anniversary Grand Prix at Silverstone.
